=== Adam Gonnerman ===

===== About Me =====

Linux enthusiast (Ubuntu in particular), open source advocate, newbie Bash programmer and dabbler in Python. Working for a start-up in NYC, transitioning from customer service into system administration (via QA) while mulling over how best to promote open source solutions and sci/tech education in Brazil, South America.

My blog is <nowiki>[[http://igneousquill.net|Igneous Quill]]</nowiki>, and I'm fairly active on <nowiki>[[http://twitter.com/igneousquill|Twitter]]</nowiki>.  I also maintain the <nowiki>[[http://igneousquill.ning.com|Igneous Quill Tech Forum]]</nowiki>.
